page.description: If a component/page embedded in a UX Component is shown in a popup window, custom buttons can be added to the window to add additional functionality.

discussion.p: These properties are only exposed if the Window Properties [Window type] has been set to 'Popup-modal' or 'Popup-modeless'.

section.title: Has custom toolbar buttons
section.description: Specify if the window has custom buttons in the window toolbar (at the bottom of the window).

section.title: Define buttons
section.description: Define the buttons that appear in the window toolbar (at the bottom of the window). This option is only available if *[ui:Has custom toolbar buttons]* has been checked.

section.title: Buttons in-line style
section.description: Defines in-line CSS styling for the window buttons. This option is only available if *[ui:Has custom toolbar buttons]* has been checked.
section.tip: To display the buttons left justified, enter an in-line style of: *[css:text-align:left;]*
